title: Pier Luigi Bersani - Wikipedia
snippet: On 27 March Bersani failed to strike a deal for forming a new Italian government with the grassroots Five-Star Movement (M5S) which held the balance of power after February's inconclusive elections. On 19 April Bersani announced he would be stepping down from his post as Democratic Party leader ...

title: Pier Luigi Bersani facts for kids
snippet: Pier Luigi Bersani (born 29 September 1951) is an Italian politician. He was the leader, or Secretary, of the Democratic Party (PD). This was Italy's main centre-left political group from 2009 to 2013.
